metadata.synopsis: Patron chatter on Elfsong Tavern - 'Truffles' Smythe.

0.speaker: Truffles Smythe
0.text: Whenever I'm done pushing my broom, you'll find me here wetting my whistle!
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

1.speaker: Truffles Smythe
1.text: Did you hear? Some adventurers rented out the tavern's whole upper floor. I guess it's back to crashing at Basilisk Gate for me.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The players paid for exclusive use of Elfsong Tavern first floor.

2.speaker: Truffles Smythe
2.text: Hey, there, Cap'n! Haven't seen you around before. If anyone asks for Truffles, that's me!
2.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

3.speaker: Truffles Smythe
3.text: A new archduke. Fancy! We never had one of them before.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.

4.speaker: Truffles Smythe
4.text: I hear Lorroakan was a greedy old son of a worg. I wonder who got all his loot?
4.context: InternalNodeContext: Lorroakan has been deposed from Ramazith's Tower + no longer owns Sorcerous Sundries

5.speaker: Truffles Smythe
5.text: The rumour is Lord Gortash is dead. I hope to the gods it isn't true.

6.speaker: Truffles Smythe
6.text: Still thinking about asking Rolan, Sundries' new owner, for a job. But what if he's as big a bastard as Lorroakan was?
6.context: InternalNodeContext: Rolan as new owner of Sorcerous Sundries

7.speaker: Truffles Smythe
7.text: The hero returns! Looking for more applause?
7.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's Mouth

8.speaker: Truffles Smythe
8.text: So, ol' Sorc' Sundries has a new owner. I should apply for a job - I'm sick of pushing a broom around Basilisk Gate.
8.context: InternalNodeContext: Rolan as new owner of Sorcerous Sundries

9.speaker: Truffles Smythe
9.text: What the devil was that commotion out in the harbour? Did the Sea Bitch burp?
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Iron Throne Destruction (ie. vague trouble in harbour)

10.speaker: Truffles Smythe
10.text: Wait a minute! You know what? I bet you're the one who's taken over the whole upper floor!
10.context: InternalNodeContext: The players paid for exclusive use of Elfsong Tavern first floor.

11.speaker: Truffles Smythe
11.text: I was pushing my broom at Basilisk Gate when our Steel Watcher just went all limp, like. No one could get it to move. And I hear they're all like that!

12.speaker: Truffles Smythe
12.text: So Lorroakan's gone! He wasn't even in Ramazith's Tower long enough to change its name.
12.context: InternalNodeContext: Lorroakan has been deposed from Ramazith's Tower + no longer owns Sorcerous Sundries

13.speaker: Truffles Smythe
13.text: If you're going to hang around, you should be drinking to the new archduke!
13.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.

14.speaker: Truffles Smythe
14.text: Well, if it isn't the hero of the hour! At least, that's what I read in the Mouth.
14.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's Mouth

15.speaker: Truffles Smythe
15.text: I'm telling you, I saw it. Out by the chain, the whole surface of Grey Harbour was boiling!
15.context: InternalNodeContext: Iron Throne Destruction (ie. vague trouble in harbour)

16.speaker: Truffles Smythe
16.text: I don't know what knocked out all the Steel Watchers, and I don't want to know. I'm staying inside!

17.speaker: Truffles Smythe
17.text: If Gortash is really gone, I'm not going home sober, I can tell you that.
